name: Ball 3D: Soccer Online
description:
In Ball 3D you compete online in 7 sports, against up to 30 opponents. We have Racing Soccer, Racing, Soccer, Basketball, Hockey, Handball and Battle Royale. Already played by over 1 000 000 players.

Features:


  • 7 Sports: Racing Soccer, Racing, Soccer, Basketball, Hockey, Handball, Battle Royale
  • 12 Game Modes
  • 23 Stadiums
  • 100% Control
  • Multiplayer
  • Realistic Physics
  • T-Shirts Customization
  • Replays
  • Statistics
  • Training Bots
  • Custom Celebrations
